query:
INSERT INTO job_result_stream_v2 (workspace_id, job_id, stream, idx)
            VALUES (
                $1, 
                $2,
                $3, 
                (
                    SELECT COALESCE(MAX(idx), -1) + 1 
                    FROM job_result_stream_v2 
                    WHERE job_id = $2
                )
            )
